meanings.definition: The meal eaten in the middle of the day.
meanings.sent1: During school, students enjoy their lunches in the cafeteria.
meanings.sent2: I always pack my favorite sandwich for my lunches at work.
meanings.sent3: The lunches at the picnic disappeared quickly, leaving everyone satisfied.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the aroma of delicious lunches.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen during our family lunches.

meanings.sent1: Let's lunches together at the new restaurant down the street.
meanings.sent2: She lunches with her colleagues every Friday to catch up.
meanings.sent3: The cat lunches on its favorite treats, purring contentedly.
meanings.sent4: The team lunches before the big game to boost their energy.
meanings.sent5: He lunches quickly to have time for a short walk before returning to work.
